body.p:
Columbus Ky April 6th -- 65
to Adjt Gen. D W Leinsey
Frankfort
Sir yours of March 16th in answer to a Note writen by me to Gov Bramlett is to hand

There was in the last sesion of our Legislature an act past authorising each County in the state to rais and organise a company for the benefeit and protection of the State -- there is also a special order isued from the war department authorising a force to be raised in Western Kentucky to be known as Gregorys comdg at least I am informed sutch is the case, though I have not as yet come up with the order but I suppose it all means about the same thing as one force will superceed the necesity of the other
if you will foward to me the authority for the County of Ballard I will proceed to rais and organize the troups for that county

Very Respectfully Yours
Lieut S Talley
8th Ky Vol Cav

mustered
discharged by reson of expiration of term of servis

Columbus Ky
April 6. 1865
Talley S.
Lt. 8" Ky Vol. Cav.
Answered April 11/'65
Inspector Gen's office
Has recd your letter of March 16th. Send him authority to raise a Co. for protection of Ballard County --
Respectfully referred to Maj W H Hays Inspt Genl of Ky. for reply

D, W, Lindsey
Adj Genl Ky

L B No 11 -- 1865 P. 384
Recd A. G. O. Ky 11 April 1865
